attributes.action: We want no summer school or if we do at least no school unform is too hot
attributes.additional_details: NO SUMMER SCHOOL OR NO SCHOOL UNIFORM
attributes.background: We want no summer school or if we do have summer school at least we dont wear any uniform because if we wear uniform all of us will be sweating and it will be so frustrating.  OR WE WANT NO SUMMER SCHOOL.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574585

It is up to individual schools whether to set a school uniform policy, including whether this varies from season to season.
